title: Onboarding overlay falls back to generic steps without persona context
description: When onboarding APIs fail the UI renders hard-coded Sevensa steps, so finance, warehouse, and other personas lose targeted guidance during first-run.

title: Session tokens persist indefinitely in localStorage
description: Tokens are stored without expiry and logout forces a window reload, breaking OIDC flows and increasing risk of stale credentials.

title: Demo credentials hard-coded into login UI
description: Login initializes with shared usernames/passwords and displays credential hints, blocking MFA adoption and confusing enterprise onboarding.

title: Planner persona presets inaccessible from UI
description: Multiple persona filters are defined in code but not exposed, so onboarding cannot tailor dashboards per role.
